head.title: Ruby 2.1
head.intro: Quick reference to the [new features in Ruby 2.1](https://www.ruby-lang.org/).

body.title: Named arguments with defaults
body.elms:
```ruby
# length is required
def pad(num, length:, char: "0")
  num.to_s.rjust(length, char)
end
```

```ruby
pad(42, length: 6) #=> "000042"
pad(42) #=> #<ArgumentError: missing keyword: length>
```
